availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: State militia organization from Cynthiana, Harrison County, Kentucky. Organized in Cynthiana, Kentucky, from January 26, 1861, to July 16, 1861. Mustered as Company F, 2nd Kentucky Infantry (C.S.A.) on July 16, 1861. Commanders: Captain, W.S. Rogers; Captain, R.M. Kelley; 1st lieutenant, James S. Withers; 1st lieutenant, J.M. Givens; 2nd lieutenant, A. Welsh; 3rd lieutenant, O. Kennard.

ab.bibl: William A. Penn, Kentucky Rebel Town: The Civil War Battles of Cynthiana and Harrison County (Lexington: University Press of Kentucky, 2016), 20-21.
